Headline: #148 Clarendon/Michigan Express & #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near State/Lake
ShortDescription: NB 148 Clarendon/Michigan Express & 146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan buses are temp. rerouted via State, Wacker, Michigan due to street blockage at State/Lake

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #148 Clarendon/Michigan Express & #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Wacker, Michigan due to street blockage near State/Lake.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
